text: Mute Records is a record company founded in 1978. In England they have lots of bands signed to them such as Depeche Mode Erasure, Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds, and fad gadget. The first artist fad gadget was artist to sign to Mute Records. In 1978 The normal also signed in 1978 and Yazoo in 1981. Category:British record labels
title: Mute Records
